name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】『Connect Addict』✨3rd Anniversary Live【#獅白ぼたん3周年】 [dsH4DXtSpqk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Lioness' Pride (remix ver.)' by Shishiro Botan.
MC section where Shishiro Botan introduces herself and her 3rd Anniversary Live.

subtitles.original: どこか孤独の裏返しで
subtitles.english: Somewhere, as the flip side of loneliness

subtitles.original: ずっと一人なんだろうって思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought I'd be alone forever

subtitles.original: 前だけ睨んで　ただ夢かけて
subtitles.english: Staring only ahead, just chasing dreams

subtitles.original: 足跡見失って
subtitles.english: Losing sight of my footprints

subtitles.original: 変わらない曇天　交わさない怒天
subtitles.english: Unchanging cloudy sky, unexchanged thunderous sky

subtitles.original: はぐれ山猫だって笑った
subtitles.english: They laughed, calling me a stray wildcat

subtitles.original: 音の中だった　世界満ちて広げていく
subtitles.english: In the sound, the world fills and expands

subtitles.original: 人たちの声や眼差しに　かざされて
subtitles.english: Exposed to people's voices and gazes

subtitles.original: 私は変わりつつある　つぼみのライオンね
subtitles.english: I'm a lion in the bud, changing

subtitles.original: 立って　今　爪を研ぐ
subtitles.english: Standing up now, sharpening my claws

subtitles.original: 友の前歩くため
subtitles.english: To walk ahead with my friends

subtitles.original: 真っ白い獅子は　群れて群れて群れを抱く
subtitles.english: The pure white lion flocks, flocks, and embraces the flock

subtitles.original: それが私を支えてくれるから
subtitles.english: Because that's what supports me

subtitles.original: 純白の孤高を追って挑んでくれるものたち
subtitles.english: Those who chase and challenge the pure white isolation

subtitles.original: We have the pride in me, a lion's pride
subtitles.english: We have the pride in me, a lion's pride

subtitles.original: それこそ私の誇り
subtitles.english: That is my pride

subtitles.original: 怪我したふりして縄張りの
subtitles.english: Pretending to be injured, of my territory

subtitles.original: 線を引いて無差別に引いてた
subtitles.english: I was drawing lines indiscriminately

subtitles.original: 目指したものだけ　輝くものだけ
subtitles.english: Only what I aimed for, only what shines

subtitles.original: そしてただ迷うだけ　見失う軌道
subtitles.english: And just getting lost, losing the orbit

subtitles.original: 解けなかった棘に　嫌気広がりゆく
subtitles.english: Aversion spreads to the thorns I couldn't undo

subtitles.original: 私たちの熱　少しずつ帯びていくから
subtitles.english: Because our heat is gradually building up

subtitles.original: もし遠く遠く離れていても
subtitles.english: Even if we are far, far apart

subtitles.original: 流微弱に向け微笑む
subtitles.english: Smiling towards the faint flowing light

subtitles.original: 友に声届けるため
subtitles.english: To deliver our voices to our friends

subtitles.original: 一輪の獅子は　咲いて咲いて咲き吠えたいのさ
subtitles.english: A single lion wants to bloom, bloom, and howl

subtitles.original: 燃ゆる時を見守る人のために
subtitles.english: For the people who watch over the burning moments

subtitles.original: 百獣の王は　一緒に一緒に咲き吠えたいのさ
subtitles.english: The king of beasts wants to bloom and howl together

subtitles.original: We can be the king of beasts together
subtitles.english: We can be the king of beasts together

subtitles.original: 白銀の獅子は　駆けて駆けて駆けつけ照らす
subtitles.english: The silver-white lion runs, runs, and rushes to illuminate

subtitles.original: もう不安に振り返ることはないから
subtitles.english: Because I won't look back in anxiety anymore

subtitles.original: 百獣の王は　悠久を信じる力なのさ
subtitles.english: The king of beasts is the power that believes in eternity

subtitles.original: 今なら前だけを　この夢だけを　見て走っていられる
subtitles.english: Now I can keep running, looking only at this dream

subtitles.original: 後ろに大切な私たちの群れを纏うのだから
subtitles.english: Because I have our precious flock behind me

subtitles.original: We have the pride in me, a lion's pride
subtitles.english: We have the pride in me, a lion's pride

subtitles.original: それこそ私の誇り
subtitles.english: That is my pride

subtitles.original: 3rd Anniversary Live Connect: Addict
subtitles.english: 3rd Anniversary Live Connect: Addict

subtitles.original: はい！ということで皆さん、改めてまして、ららーいおん！
subtitles.english: All right! So once again, everyone, La-La-Lion!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ5期生、獅白ぼたんです！
subtitles.english: Hololive 5th Generation, Shishiro Botan here!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ということで...
subtitles.english: Yay! And so...
